blog.name: designs-by-sloan
blog.title: Designs by Sloan
blog.description:
Hi there! My name is Sloan. ★
I'm a Canadian freelance artist.
My art is digital and I use CSP to recreate a bright, watercolour-look for my works!
[Art commissions are open]
Please keep credits intact when reblogging. Thanks!!

summary: In Pokemon Sword & Pokemon Shield you’ll meet the granddaughter of Professor Magnolia, Sonia. As Leon’s childhood friend, a...
caption:
In Pokemon Sword & Pokemon Shield you’ll meet the granddaughter of Professor Magnolia, Sonia. As Leon’s childhood friend, a young researcher, and assistant to Professor Magnolia, she’ll provide valuable knowledge and wisdom to aid you on your adventure.

Pokemon Sword & Pokemon Shield only on Nintendo Switch!

title: US: Nintendo Download For 6th June 2019
body:
US: Nintendo Download For 6th June 2019

  • Nintendo eShop on Nintendo Switch
    • Slay the Spire – The Slay the Spiregame fuses card games and roguelikes to make a dynamic single-player deck-builder. Discover hundreds of cards to add to your deck with each attempt at climbing the Spire. Select cards that work together to efficiently dispatch foes and reach the top. Whenever you embark on a journey up the Spire, the layout differs each time.…

View On WordPress

I draw video game related fan art.

Big fan of Pokémon, The Legend of Zelda, Splatoon, Dragalia Lost, and pretty much anything Nintendo. I also make fake Pokémon, or “Fakemon” from time to time.

blog.name: netocanessa
blog.title: Carlos Canessa Draws
blog.description: Hey there, my name is Carlos! I draw storyboards, printed illustrations and comics. Currently developing my own webcomic. I have been working as a freelance illustrator for the past 6 years. Currently reside in Los Angeles. If you like what you see and would like some pictures drawn contact me at netocanessa@gmail.com ! You can also find external links to other sites with more art at the bottom of this page. Thank you for stopping by!

summary: Boxing Champs Looking For A Knockout On Switch This June
title: Boxing Champs Looking For A Knockout On Switch This June
body:
#BoxingChamps Looking For A Knockout On #NintendoSwitch This June

If you are looking for a knockout of a game for Nintendo Switch then look no further. Raz Games have announced that their Arcade boxing game Boxing Champs is coming to the Hybrid Console on June 20th. The game will use both joysticks to deliver punches and has an air Punch-Out!! about it.

We have the official announcement below, detailing features and a trailer for Boxing Champs below.

Boxing…

View On WordPress
